"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"bold": true, "text": "Some of the key benefits of this scheme are:"}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Access to superior breed rams:", "bold": true}, {"text": " The scheme provides access to high-quality rams of superior breeds such as Merino, Rambouillet, and Hampshire, which can improve the genetic potential of the sheep population and enhance their productivity. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Affordable rates:", "bold": true}, {"text": " The rams are provided at subsidized rates, which makes them more affordable for sheep breeders who may not have the financial resources to purchase them at market rates.
